com.unvired.ump.agent

Interface IHTTPRequest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IUMPRequest, java.io.Serializable

    public interface IHTTPRequest
extends IUMPRequest
    The interface IHTTPRequest provides a simple abstraction to build a HTTP request 
     Sample code for a HTTP request to read product details - "http://acme.com:8888/inventory/catalog?matID=123"
   
  public void execute(IBusinessProcess process)
  {
      IHTTPRequest httpRequest = (IHTTPRequest)process.createRequestObject(RequestType.HTTP);
      //HTTP Protocol
      httpRequest.setProtocol(Protocol.HTTP);

      //HTTP Server
      httpRequest.setServer("acme.com");
 
      //HTTP Port
      httpRequest.setPort(8888);
 
      //HTTP Resource path
      httpRequest.setPath("/inventory/catalog");
      
      //Query parameters
      Hashtable queryParams = new Hashtable();
      queryParams.put("matID", "123"); *              
      httpRequest.setParameters(queryParams);

      IHTTPResponse httpResponse =  process.getService().submitHTTPRequest(httpRequest, "COMPANY_NAMESPACE", "FUNCTION_NAME");
  }
